trans-unit.source: Converts objects to and from a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter"></xref> can convert an object of the specified type to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength"></xref>, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter"></xref>可以將指定的型別物件<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength"> </xref>，使用指定的內容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter> can convert the following types to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength>: - <xref:System.String> - <xref:System.Decimal> - <xref:System.Single> - <xref:System.Double> - <xref:System.Int16> - <xref:System.Int32> - <xref:System.Int64> - <xref:System.UInt16> - <xref:System.UInt32> - <xref:System.UInt64>

The type to convert from.

true if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter"></xref> can convert the specified type to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength"></xref>; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: true，否則<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter"></xref>可以轉換指定的型別<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength"> </xref>; 否則為 false。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter"></xref> can convert a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength"></xref> to the specified type.

trans-unit.source: The CanConvertTo method returns `true` if `destinationType` is <xref:System.String> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor>.
Otherwise, CanConvertTo returns `false`.
An object that provides a format context.
The type to convert to.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter"></xref> can convert a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength"></xref> to the specified type; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified object to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter> can convert the following types to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength>: - <xref:System.String> - <xref:System.Decimal> - <xref:System.Single> - <xref:System.Double> - <xref:System.Int16> - <xref:System.Int32> - <xref:System.Int64> - <xref:System.UInt16> - <xref:System.UInt32> - <xref:System.UInt64> Call the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> method before calling the ConvertFrom to avoid throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter>可以轉換下列的類型，以<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength>:- <xref:System.String>- <xref:System.Decimal>- <xref:System.Single>- <xref:System.Double>- <xref:System.Int16>- <xref:System.Int32>- <xref:System.Int64>- <xref:System.UInt16>- <xref:System.UInt32>-<xref:System.UInt64>呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A>方法，然後再呼叫以避免擲回例外狀況 ConvertFrom。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> </xref:System.UInt64> </xref:System.UInt32> </xref:System.UInt16> </xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Int16> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Single> </xref:System.Decimal> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter>
